text: @realDonaldTrump It’s name is Covid19 or Corona Virus - NOT the Chinese Virus.🤦🏻‍♂️ You are - AGAIN - neglecting the existence of something that can kill the people YOU are SUPPOSED to protect. AND simultaneously creating further division. Maybe you should re-check the responsibilities of your job?
